name: worker-pouch

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-browser
scripts.build: mkdirp dist && npm run browserify && npm run min
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-browser
scripts.build: mkdirp dist && npm run browserify && npm run min
scripts.min: UGLIFY=1 browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin client | ./bin/es3ify.js | derequire | uglifyjs -mc > dist/pouchdb.worker-pouch.min.js
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server

scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server

scripts.build: mkdirp dist && npm run browserify && npm run min
scripts.browserify: browserify -s workerPouch -p bundle-collapser/plugin client | ./bin/es3ify.js | derequire > dist/pouchdb.worker-pouch.js

scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-browser
scripts.build: mkdirp dist && run-scripts build-workerified-code browserify min
scripts.min: UGLIFY=1 browserify -s workerPouch -p bundle-collapser/plugin . | ./bin/es3ify.js | derequire | uglifyjs -mc > dist/pouchdb.worker-pouch.min.js
scripts.dev: npm run build-workerified-code && browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server
scripts.test-custom-local: run-scripts build-workerified-code build-custom-worker && zuul --ui mocha-bdd --local 9000 --no-coverage test/custom-api/test.js
scripts.test-custom: run-scripts build-workerified-code build-custom-worker && zuul --ui mocha-bdd --phantom --no-coverage test/custom-api/test.js
